alert.note: Alert for San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:36PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 415 PM MST... At 335 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hilltop, or 22 miles northeast of Globe, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hilltop and Sawmill. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 262 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
